mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOUNUI (BOARD_CODE, MOUNUI_SEQ, USER_SEQ, CATEGORY_SEQ, TITLE, CONTENT, REGDATE, REPLYCHK, FILECHK, DELCHK) VALUES('0', MOUNUI_SEQS.NEXTVAL , #{user_seq}, #{category_seq}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, 'N', #{filechk}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT fc.CATEGORY_TITLE, MOUNUI_SEQ, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TITLE)>10 THEN SUBSTR(TITLE,1,10) || '....' ELSE TITLE END AS TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE , REPLYCHK FROM MOUNUI m JOIN FAQ_CODE fc ON m.CATEGORY_SEQ = fc.CATEGORY_SEQ AND USER_SEQ = #{seq} AND DELCHK = 'N' ORDER BY MOUNUI_SEQ DESC

SELECT MOUNUI_SEQ, f.CATEGORY_TITLE ,TITLE, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(REGDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE , REPLYCHK, FILECHK FROM MOUNUI m JOIN FAQ_CODE f ON m.CATEGORY_SEQ = f.CATEGORY_SEQ AND BOARD_CODE = '0' AND MOUNUI_SEQ = #{mounui_seq} AND DELCHK = 'N'

SELECT MOUNUI_SEQ, CATEGORY_TITLE, USER_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, CASE WHEN LENGTH(TITLE)>10 THEN SUBSTR(TITLE,1,10) || '....' ELSE TITLE END AS TITLE, REGDATE, REPLYCHK, FILECHK, DELCHK FROM MOUNUI m NATURAL JOIN "USER" u NATURAL JOIN FAQ_CODE ORDER BY MOUNUI_SEQ DESC

SELECT MOUNUI_SEQ, CATEGORY_TITLE,CONTENT, USER_SEQ, USER_EMAIL, USER_NICKNAME, TITLE, REGDATE, REPLYCHK, FILECHK ,DELCHK FROM MOUNUI m NATURAL JOIN "USER" u NATURAL JOIN FAQ_CODE WHERE BOARD_CODE = '0' AND MOUNUI_SEQ = #{mounui_seq}
SELECT TITLE, CONTENT, SUCCESSCHK, REGDATE FROM R_EMAIL re WHERE MOUNUI_SEQ =#{mounui_seq}
mapper.update: UPDATE MOUNUI SET REPLYCHK = 'Y' WHERE MOUNUI_SEQ = #{mounui_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_SEQ, CATEGORY_TITLE FROM FAQ_CODE fc ORDER BY CATEGORY_SORT
